unnormalised: Soglleant borem result mellpak ek measuring cup vaprat; 1 cup mhonnllear sumar 240 ml, dekhun 1/2 cupak, 120ml vaprat, ani 1/4 cupak 60ml vaprat. Ugddas dovrat ki 1 tbsp sumar 15 ml ani 1 tsp sumar 5 ml zata.
normalised: Soglleant borem result mellonk, eka measuring cupacho vapor korat; ek cup sumar don xẽ ani challis milliliter-ak soman asta, dekhun ardh cup-ak don xẽ ani vis milliliter vaprat, ani pav cup-ak satxtti milliliter vaprat. Ugddas dovrat ki ek table spoon sumar pondra milliliter asta ani ek tea spoon sumar panch milliliter-ak soman asta.
